title: Patch opening problems
body: I have internet. But  when i'm  opening the  patch it said ''RADS Error; Couldn't connect the HTTP server.Please check that your internet connection is enabled  and that your firewall is not blocking access'' Please help me...{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Thanks for attention. I deleted the game and then i download again but now ; i hae other problem. I opened the patch and then patch said the game is updating but  a few moments later the retry screen is coming . BUT I HAVE ALSO CONNECTÄ°ON. PLEASE HELP ME!!!

There are a number of local network configurations that could be blocking League from starting properly. We have consolidated the most common solutions for this issue in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if you notice any changes after working through those steps.
prob a firewall, or maybe some parental control  thing is blocking your wifi thru your router.
